content.rendered:
If you are looking for the Concordia University Admission Requirement for International Students, look no further, the requirements are here. The Concordia University Admission application for 2024 intake is currently ongoing for some courses. Please check the notice board below to search for deadlines. To apply for the Concordia University, 2024 admission, kindly follow this link.

The management of Concordia University wishes to let all prospective students of the University know that admission for the 2024 intake is ongoing. All domestic and international students can now apply.

What to Know About the Concordia University Admission Requirements 2024?

The Concordia University Admission 2024 portal is designed to receive students’ applications for admission. The application processes and admission requirements are available on the university website.

Click here to read more

Concordia University Admission Requirements for International Students

The Concordia University admission requirements for international students requires that all applicants meet the following general requirements:

  • A completed application form
  • Official transcripts from all post-secondary institutions attended
  • Two letters of recommendation
  • A personal statement
  • Proof of English language proficiency

The minimum English language proficiency requirements for international students are as follows:

  • IELTS Academic: 6.5 overall, with no band score below 6.0 in any component
  • TOEFL iBT: 90 overall, with a minimum of 20 in each section
  • PTE Academic: 60 overall, with a minimum of 50 in each section

How to Access Concordia University Application Portal

  • Visit the Concordia University Application Portal
  • Complete your application
  • Submit academic transcript
  • Pay all application fees
  • Submit your application.
  • Monitor Application Status.

Concordia University Application Deadline

International student seeking to advance career in Concordia University can follow early application timeline. The application deadline for Concordia University for fall 2024 is March 1. For winter 2024, the deadline is Mayember 1.

During the application, relevant documents are required.

To apply, you will need to submit the following:

  • A completed application form
  • Official transcripts from all post-secondary institutions attended
  • Two letters of recommendation
  • A personal statement
  • A writing sample

Note:

For making updates to the choice of program, courses, and so on, students must adhere to deadlines for dropping and adding courses and to ensure that your program of study is complete and up-to-date.
